name: Venu AI
headline: Build your community with Venu AI
description: Build your community with Venu AI, the community building, B2B connections, and event marketing platform for enterprise.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:community; industry:sales; industry:marketing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jeremy Lam, Founder
founders.description: Automate community building and build self-sustaining top of funnel sales outbound using podcasts, webinars, meetups, and conferences.

founders.name: Nanette Jackson, Founder
founders.description: Currently, I am the COO of Wvrld Studios Inc., whose objective is to bring people together in Virtual Reality (VR). Our exciting new VR application is VENU, allowing events professionals to host B2B or B2C  trade shows, expositions, conferences, or events online in 3-D from Windows, Mac, or VR headset.

founders.name: Patrick Nguyen, Founder
founders.description: Software developer, technical and multiplatform support for Venu.

# Automate community building
Sales teams achieve 10x results, 40% response rate, 30 qualified sales calls in 30 days, 10 paying customers a month, content marketing, 100 new community members a month, and build a self-sustaining top of funnel sales pipeline with Venu AI.
[Contact Us](https://www.venu3d.com/</contact>)[Log In](https://www.venu3d.com/<https:/ai.venu3d.com/portal>)
### Trusted by Industry Leaders
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/6567aeb2457ccdbcccc7f160_prescientlogo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/6412203ae9d81a9b11259184_walmart.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/6412203bd867b02f76ddc4e2_yc.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/641ce75c045cc3e7f446adea_hirectlogoblack_orig.png)
## What You Are**missing**
Can't get on a call with sales leads? No responses? Get marked as spam?**Start talking to sales leads face to face in 2 weeks with Venu AI.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/651dcc8939fdbecaef3db8ff_chat-bold.svg)
40% Response Rate
### Business networking
Reach out to 100 sales leads. Get in touch with 40. It's that simple.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/651dcca2ba8b0b114c2aba1f_user-bold.svg)
100 Outreaches a Week
### AI-powered matchmaking
Automate high quality personalization for high volume outreach
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/651dcca2c488f6ae972db6ee_phone-bold.svg)
30 Sales Calls in 30 Days
### Compelling interaction
Let us book sales calls, so you can focus on closing deals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/651dcca418c50f92e15be97b_wallet-bold.svg)
10x Results of an SDR
### Water cooler conversations
Achieve 10x results without the hassle of training or hiring.
# Book Sales Calls from cold outbound.‍Never get marked as spam.
Tried cold outbound but gotten no responses or your domain blocked for spam?‍Nobody wants to be sold to, and Venu AI has cracked the code with decades of community building experience.‍Leverage Venu's unique service and AI to build trust, working relationships, and community with automated podcast, webinar, and conference production to meet face to face with sales leads, close deals, and build a self-sustaining sales channel.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/652bf4d722ff746542c997f5_philosophy-image.png)
## Get real results with Venu
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/651dc757020521fcc39afa80_Telivy-logo.png)
**How Telivy booked 31 sales calls and closed 10 paying customers in 30 days with Venu AI**

Vishal Kolar
Director of Event Marketing, Hirect

**"Venu built a world that far exceeded our expectations. Attendees were delighted by customizations that made our event personal."**
Malaka Grant

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/6412203bd867b02f76ddc4e2_yc.png)

Jared Fiedman
Group Partner, Y Combinator
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/641e240554670b50249efa17_AWE-logo-300x247.png)
**â€œGreat experience. Venu made it easy for us to do networking without physically attending an event."**

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6412116fd1e70e6a172b8da0/6412116fd1e70e3bac2b8e0e_icon_slider-arrow-right.svg)
##  Build your community today with Venu AI

generated_description:
**Venu AI: Building Communities through Technology**

Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Venu AI is a budding company located in San Jose, California. With a lean team of just five employees, they tackle the ambitious mission of helping businesses build their communities. Their platform focuses on B2B connections and event marketing, making it a robust tool for enterprise-level clients.

At its core, Venu AI aims to automate community buildingâ€”transforming the often tedious process into something efficient and effective. Theyâ€™ve designed their system to achieve impressive results for sales teams; weâ€™re talking numbers like a 40% response rate, 30 qualified sales calls in thirty days, and a self-sustaining sales pipeline that sees ten new paying customers every month. Imagine achieving tenfold results with none of the hassle of traditional sales methods. 

Their clientele includes some heavyweight names like Microsoft, Walmart, and Accenture, showcasing their credibility in the market. The testimonials from these industry leaders add a layer of trust for potential customers and partners, reinforcing that this is a platform not to be overlooked.

Venu AI harnesses AI-powered matchmaking to create personalized outreach, automating the grunt work that sales teams usually dread. The key? Connecting face-to-face with prospects through automated events like webinars and conferences, facilitating those crucial networking opportunities that can lead to closed deals.

Accessible through their [website](https://www.venu3d.com), Venu AI is not just about offering a service; itâ€™s about revolutionizing how communitiesâ€”and the businesses within themâ€”engage, connect, and grow. If you find yourself struggling to book those sales calls or feel like your outreach is falling on deaf ears, Venu AI promises a pathway to revitalizing your approach through technology.

In summary, whether youâ€™re looking to enhance your sales pipeline or strengthen community ties, Venu AI claims to have the tools to help you get thereâ€”efficiently, effectively, and with AI-powered ingenuity.
